attributes.action: Prevent the government from holding a second referendum on membership of the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
If the EU is so wonderful why did the UK not join the Euro. 
The EU referendum had one of the highest turnouts for voting. 
The majority of people of this great nation have voted to leave the EU, let this be the end of it.
attributes.background: I have lived in the UK all my life, I love Britain, I work as many people I know do and many of them are young people, certainly below 60 - all who voted to leave the EU. Leaving the EU now means more intelligent control of our borders, British justice, a stronger UK free to trade with all countries
